name: Apple Inc
description: Apple Inc. is a multinational technology company that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.
sustainability_goals: Achieve carbon neutrality by 2022 and use 100% renewable energy by 2030.

name: The Walt Disney Company
description: The Walt Disney Company is a multinational entertainment conglomerate that operates a diverse range of media networks, studios, and theme parks.
sustainability_goals: Reduce net greenhouse gas emissions by 50% by 2025 and achieve net-zero emissions by 2040.

name: Procter & Gamble Co.
description: Procter & Gamble Co. is a multinational consumer goods corporation that specializes in personal care and household products.
sustainability_goals: Reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 50% by 2030 and achieve net-zero emissions by 2040.

name: Johnson & Johnson
description: Johnson & Johnson is a multinational healthcare conglomerate that specializes in pharmaceuticals, medical devices, and consumer health products.
sustainability_goals: Reduce carbon footprint by 20% by 2025 and achieve carbon neutrality in its operations by 2030.

name: Microsoft Corporation
description: Microsoft Corporation is a technology company that develops, licenses, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, and personal computers and services.
sustainability_goals: Achieve carbon neutrality by 2022 and use 100% renewable energy by 2030.

name: Amazon.com, Inc.
description: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company that focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.
sustainability_goals: Achieve carbon neutrality in its operations by 2035 and source 50% of electricity from renewable energy by 2025.

name: JPMorgan Chase & Co.
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. is a multinational investment bank and financial services holding company that provides a range of financial services, including investment banking, asset management, and consumer banking.
sustainability_goals: Reduce carbon emissions by 30% by 2025 and achieve net-zero carbon emissions by 2040.

name: CVS Health Corporation
description: CVS Health Corporation is an American healthcare company that provides pharmacy services, retail pharmacy, and healthcare benefits management services.
sustainability_goals: Achieve carbon neutrality by 2022 and use 100% renewable energy by 2030.

name: Alphabet Inc.
description: Alphabet Inc. is a multinational technology conglomerate that specializes in internet-related services and products.
sustainability_goals: Achieve carbon neutrality by 2022 and use 100% renewable energy by 2030.

name: Walmart Inc.
description: Walmart Inc. is a multinational retail corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores.
sustainability_goals: Achieve zero waste in key markets by 2025 and source 100% of energy from renewable sources by 2035.

name: NVIDIA Corporation
description: NVIDIA Corporation is a multinational technology company that specializes in designing graphics processing units (GPUs) for gaming and professional markets.
sustainability_goals: Reduce carbon emissions by 30% by 2025 and achieve net-zero carbon emissions by 2040.

name: Verizon Communications Inc.
description: Verizon Communications Inc. is a multinational telecommunications conglomerate that provides wireless communications, internet, and TV services.
sustainability_goals: Achieve carbon neutrality in its operations by 2035 and source 50% of electricity from renewable energy by 2025.
